abstract: The longtime banker, once a top executive at Merrill Lynch, will focus mainly on working with banks, insurers and other financial institutions.
snippet: The longtime banker, once a top executive at Merrill Lynch, will focus mainly on working with banks, insurers and other financial institutions.
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey M. Peek, who once lost a race to become the chief executive of Merrill Lynch, is coming home, in a way.

headline.main: Jeffrey Peek Named an Executive Vice Chairman at Bank of America

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
